prompt: Create a clean minimalistic forgot password interface with light theme and white background. Display centered 'Forgot Password?' title in dark gray and explanatory text in medium gray about sending reset link to email. Include single email input field with border outline, email keyboard, and hint text. Add full-width blue elevated button 'Send Reset Link' with white text and blue 'Back to Login' text button below. Use generous 24px padding and 24px spacing between elements.
